files.content: 'use client' import { Button } from '@/registry/default/ui/button' import { useTheme } from 'next-themes' import * as React from 'react' export function ModeSwitcher() { const { setTheme, resolvedTheme } = useTheme() const toggleTheme = React.useCallback(() => { setTheme(resolvedTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark') }, [resolvedTheme, setTheme]) return ( ) }
